Package dao

Class ClientDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.AbstractDAO<Client>
dao.ClientDAO
public class ClientDAO extends AbstractDAO<Client>
The ClientDAO class contains methods specific to client-related operations, such as findById and insert. These methods are implemented here to work specifically with the ClientDAO functionality and cannot be generalized or reused for other purposes.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ResultSet
    findById(int clientId, Client client)
    It returns a ResultSet made of the row in the table with the id provided as parameter.At the same time it changes the value of the client parameter to the values given in the table
    static int
    insert(Client client)
    It inserts a client to the table and returns the insertedId
